name: FPS Trainer
description:
This is a prototype for a simple FPS game that is meant to help you improve your reaction time, speed and aim. Currently you will be placed into the game where you must shoot the targets as they appear, it takes 3 body shots or 1 head shot to down a target, as your score gets higher, more targets will begin spawning simultaneously.

If you take too long to hit the targets the level will reset.
